data.summary:
As the lockdown has been extended until May 3, 2020 (or might be even extended due to constant rise in the infected patients) businesses have to be prepared for far-reaching implications on the economy, pushing the employers to find innovative ways to restructure their employee strength

This webinar aims to discuss various options and insights into some of these issues as faced currently in India
